भक्ति की सही परिभाषा और संत नामदेव की अनसुनी कहानी by Alankrita Banerjee
description:
To join Alankrita Banerjee's meditation course or to know more about Light House please visit https://lighthousekrishna.com/masters-training-course/
 
Light House is a yoga place founded by Krishna Sarvadaman Banerjee and is essentially devoted to COSMUTATION - the Art of Spontaneous Meditation in which once you are connected with the Cosmic Light or Energy, you begin to live Meditation/Yoga 24X7. 

Follow Alankrita Banerjee on instagram at https://www.instagram.com/alankrita.banerjee.pankh/
Follow Light House on instagram at https://www.instagram.com/lighthousekrishna/

title: Meditation is when the meditator is not! #sarvadamandbanerjee #nondoingmeditation  #sdbanerjee
Understanding Stress, Trauma & Release | Alankrita Banerjee’s Powerful Talk
description:
In this insightful talk, Alankrita Banerjee explores how childhood stress shapes our emotional patterns—and how conscious release can transform our relationships and inner peace.

To join Alankrita Banerjee's meditation course or to know more about Light House please visit https://lighthousekrishna.com/masters-training-course/
 
Light House is a yoga place founded by Krishna Sarvadaman Banerjee and is essentially devoted to COSMUTATION - the Art of Spontaneous Meditation in which once you are connected with the Cosmic Light or Energy, you begin to live Meditation/Yoga 24X7. 

Follow Alankrita Banerjee on instagram at https://www.instagram.com/alankrita.banerjee.pankh/
Follow Light House on instagram at https://www.instagram.com/lighthousekrishna/
